Assistant / Deputy Manager Warehouse & Logistics

Posted: 2025-10-18

Expires: 2025-11-01

Active
Assistant / Deputy Manager Warehouse & Logistics Master's / MBA (Preferably Supply Chain) with at least 5-8 years of managing warehouse and logistics operations in a large-scale organization. This position is responsible for overseeing and managing operations related to raw materials and finished goods. Key responsibilities include optimizing cubic space utilization, ensuring the timely availability of raw materials, and supervising the loading, dispatch, and transfer of finished goods. The role requires strict compliance with internal Inventory Management and SCL policies, supervisory directives, the Customer’s Code of Conduct, and EHS procedures. The primary objectives are to meet demand efficiently, enhance customer value, improve responsiveness, and drive supply chain excellence through faster delivery, greater efficiency, and improved cash flow. Location: Faisalabad Interested individuals are invited to submit their applications via the link given below. https://lnkd.in/dYTEHSgs
📍 Faisalabad#Assistant / Deputy Manager Warehouse & Logistics🧳 Experienced Required

Web Developer (Core PHP & Laravel)

Posted: 2025-10-18

Expires: 2025-11-01

Active
🚀 We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Web Developer (Core PHP & Laravel) to join our Softrix Technologies team. If you are passionate about building scalable web applications, constantly improving your technical expertise, and thrive in solving complex problems, this role is for you. 🔹 What We’re Looking For: 4–7 years of hands-on experience in Core PHP & Laravel Design, develop, and maintain high-quality web applications using Core PHP and Laravel. Build and optimize APIs, ensuring scalability, security, and efficiency. Database design, optimization, and query performance management (MySQL). Strong expertise in the Laravel framework. Architect clean, scalable, and connected solutions aligned with business needs. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement new features. Ensure clean, efficient, and maintainable code following industry best practices. Should be proficient in a Linux environment (server setup, deployment, troubleshooting). Moderate Skills: Solid understanding of ES6 JavaScript and modern JS practices. Proficiency in jQuery and other JavaScript frameworks. Hands-on experience with HTML5, CSS3, and responsive frameworks. Good knowledge of application security, performance tuning, and system monitoring. Familiarity with RESTful APIs and third-party integrations. Experience with version control systems (Git/GitHub/GitLab). Exposure to Agile/Scrum methodologies. Ability to mentor junior developers and contribute to code reviews 📍 Location: Faisalabad 💼 Job Type: Onsite 📧 Apply Now: hr@softrixtech.com
📍 Faisalabad#Web Developer (Core PHP & Laravel)🧳 Experienced Required

Salesforce Functional Consultant

Posted: 2025-10-18

Expires: 2025-11-01

Active
Speridian Technologies is looking for Salesforce Functional Consultant with strong QA and Business Analysis experience, and experience in using 𝐔𝐢𝐏𝐚𝐭𝐡 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧. Perform functional, regression, and UAT testing for Salesforce (Sales & Service Cloud). Design and automate test cases using UiPath Test Suite or equivalent tools. Collaborate with business and technical teams to validate requirements and solutions. Track defects, ensure quality deliverables, and follow QA best practices. 𝐑𝐞𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬: 3–6 years of experience as a Salesforce Functional Consultant / QA / BA. Proficiency in Sales & Service Cloud modules. Strong UiPath test automation experience. Expertise in requirements gathering, documentation, and testing processes. Salesforce certifications preferred. Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field. If you are interested then kindly share your resume at "urma.razzaq@speridian.com"
